definition: lit. a dragon's scale from the east and a dragon's claw from the west/odds and ends (idiom)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
(coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc
foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
